metadata.title: CVE-2021-23177 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
extracting a symlink with ACLs modifies ACLs of target

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-23177` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libarchive-tools - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.1
libarchive13 - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.3-2ubuntu0.1').
